comment._content: Mrs. Wing is on a rampage!
comment.authorname: Benjamoon von Schwulemann's Salon des Refusés

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Her husband was William Ricketson Wing (1830-1908) and he died in an auto accident in 1908, that is why she is still dressed for mourning in black. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._&_W._R._Wing_Company
